mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chandler, J. G. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Chandler, J. G.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov F.H. Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 14 1861. By Telegraph, From Clarksburg . . 1861. Genl Rosecrans has been informed that you have been furnished by quartermaster Meigs with complete outfit for ten 10 Va Regiments. Many of the Virginia regiments now in the field are destitute any means alleviating present wants would be acceptable. Please inform me a QM at Headquarters what the chances are JG Chandler Capt ASM 50D155pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Chandler, J. G.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
